entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Reflecting to find nullability of a generic return type is unreasonably complicated #110971
  • [API Proposal]: Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PhysicalFilesWatcher should expose modified files (Alternative where standalone FilesystemWatcher won't work) #110969
  • [JIT] Codegen issue for `InlineArray` in `record` #110968
    Future
  • InlineArray reports wrong size when struct size is specified #110962
  • Remove redundant partial modifier #110961

Closed

  • Suspiscous comment about constrained calls in `MemoryExtensions.cs`, `StringBuilder.cs`, and `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.cs` #110594
  • [mono] Linux arm64 AOT build failing on perf jobs #110963
  • [mono] AOT-llvm arm64 Performance runs crashing since 2024/09/30 #109220
  • [mono] [android] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.IPGlobalPropertiesTest.IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet fails #109280
    10.0.0
  • [mono] MiniJIT System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests getting killed #108515
    Future
  • [apple][TvOS] Timeout when building aot-instances.dll for System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests #103692
    10.0.0
  • [Apple] TvOS-arm64 failures on Serialization ExporterTypesTests #104162
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `ConvertTypeCheckPatternToNullCheck` #110973
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Experimental branch to check asmdiff #110972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #110966
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0

Merged

  • [Safe code] Clean up Guid.TryFormatX #110923
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix some paramrefs #110956
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][arm64] Remove MonoAOT aarch64 linux-gnu-5 build conditions and use the gnu-7 by default #110965
    arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete unnecessary #pragma warning disable #110948
    area-System.Linq

Updated

  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unify Swift parameter register homing with normal homing #110859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Clean up in Number.Formatting.cs #110955
    area-System.Numerics
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110839
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.x
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use -pack switch instead of -allconfigurations to create packages #110778
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] fix browser-wasm debug build #110943
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullable dereference in collection expressions not raising any warning at build time #45643
  • `dotnet run` writes the "Using launch settings from ..." message to stdout instead of stderr #45640
  • Inconcistent definition of implicit framework defines when using `/p:DefineConstants`. #45638
  • dotnet watch test --project <project>: gives MSBUILD : error MSB1001: Unknown switch #45634

Closed

  • Solution build always fail with CS2012 "Cannot open dll for writing" errors #45034
  • Current directory in `dotnet run` and VS F5 is different #9949
    Discussion
  • Test is writing to root of hard drive #7995
    Backlog
  • publishsinglefile causes runtime failure of hostpolicy.dll not found for dotnet 9.0.100 #44992

PullRequests

Created

  • Add exit code to the compatibility tool. #45642
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45636
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] dotnetcli.azureedge.net -> builds.dotnet.microsoft.com #45621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnetcli.azureedge.net -> builds.dotnet.microsoft.com #45620
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Re-rename to Roles and Extensions #8431

Updated

  • Repo Reorganization In Progress #8596
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expression Arguments #8887

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Display Class used when not required + related flow analysis #76573
  • .NET9 Regression in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp: NullReferenceException #76571

PullRequests

Created

  • Language Feature Status.md: correct dictionary expressions entries #76574
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Document breaks due to preferring ReadOnlySpan over Span #76572
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Emit opted-in string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Propagate marked attributes to synthesized fields. #76567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow users to define EmbeddedAttribute #76523
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: updates #59645
  • Blazor: Minify CSS Isolation output #59644

Closed

  • ANCM restarts on any applicationHost.config change #36870
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply HeadersLengthLimit to preamble in MultipartReader #59646
    feature-http-abstractions, area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `79219e2` to `7d76a23` #59642
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/9.0] Skip tests on internal queues too #59578
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Skip tests on internal queues too #59579
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • perf: get rid of MemoryStream in `KeyRingBasedDataProtector` #59322
    area-dataprotection, Perf, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics #59557
    pending-ci-rerun, area-security

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui.iOS CFBundleIconName not found by Apple Transporter but is actually in the info.plist #26850
  • [MAUI][dotnet8][Windows] - A blink occurs when opening a new window #26849
  • AddHostObjectToScript does not work in MAUI app (at least for WINDOWS). #26848
  • Shell PopToRootAsync doesn't happen instantly - previous pages flash quickly. Only happens in NET 9 #26846
  • White screen when changing the main page #26845
  • WebView in .NET MAUI fails to load URL with Turkish characters on Android despite URL encoding #26843
  • List View content becomes invisible In Window platform #26842
  • [MAUI]After entering the string, ‘any records’ is not displayed. #26838
  • Allow nested types in x:DataType and x:Type #26835

Closed

  • .NET MAUI Blazor: Android Status Bar Covers Top Portion of App #26839
  • Dynamically Added FlyoutItems During Navigation Not Displayed on Windows #26391
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] PopToRootAsync for modal pages - improvements #26851
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Fixed Header and Footer template is not visible in CollectionView #26844
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed ListView items height are not proper in initial loading with HasUnevenRows set as True. #26841
    community ✨
  • Fix for [Windows]ToolbarItem visibility until Page Disappearing #26836
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Simplify iOS ScrollView #26763
    p/1, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR3

Updated

  • [Windows] Tap Events Incorrectly passed Through Button - fix #26834
    p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 62 #26805
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enable Catalyst UI Tests with Screenshot Verification #26829
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 2 #26724
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview, area-controls-checkbox, partner/syncfusion
  • Flyout Icon - RTL support #26737
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fixed - [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26681
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CollectionView SelectedItem loses Background after opening and closing a Modal page #26694
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale
  • Fix [iOS]VerticalOffset Not Reset to Zero After Clearing ItemSource in CollectionView #26818
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix VerticalOffset Update When Modifying CollectionView.ItemsSource While Scrolled #26782
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion

entry.content:

PullRequests
